remarks: Commutative/associative law that swaps the last two terms in a triple vector sum.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vccom.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` W ) $.
vccom.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
vca32 $p |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G C ) = ( ( A G C ) G B ) ) $.
